comment.author: 52682399@N07
comment._content:
Dizzy Gillespie worked at the Downbeat on 52nd Street from July 18 until August 28, 1947.
"Band Routes:  Dizzy Gillespie," (Richmond Afro-American August 30, 1947, 7).

Georgie Auld worked at the Troubadour  on 52nd Street from August 14 until September 14. 1947.
(“Music–As Written, Billboard, August 16, 1947, 36). 
(“Music–As Written,” Billboard, September 13, 1947, 36).
